mapper.insert: insert into JUMAK_SHOPPING_LIST (PRODUCT_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, PRODUCT_COUNT) values (#{productNumber},#{userNumber},#{productCount})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM JUMAK_SHOPPING_LIST WHERE PRODUCT_NUMBER = #{productNumber} AND USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT CART.PRODUCT_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, PRODUCT_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_NET_WEIGHT, PRODUCT_ALCOHOLICITY, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, IMG.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID FROM JUMAK_SHOPPING_LIST CART JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT P ON CART.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} AND CART.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN IMG ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = IMG.PRODUCT_NUMBER

insert into JUMAK_ORDER (ORDER_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, ORDER_RECIPIENT, ORDER_ZIPCODE, ORDER_ADDRESS, ORDER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, ORDER_CELLPHONENUMBER, ORDER_PHONENUMBER, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATUS_NUMBER) values (#{orderNumber},#{userNumber},#{orderRecipient},#{orderZipcode},#{orderAddress},#{orderAddressDetail}, #{orderCellphoneNumber},#{orderPhoneNumber},SYSDATE,#{orderStatusNumber})
mapper.select: select U.USER_NUMBER,USER_NAME,USER_EMAIL, USER_CELLPHONENUMBER, USER_PHONENUMBER, USER_ADDRESS, USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, USER_ZIPCODE, USER_BIRTH, USER_GRADE_NUMBER from JUMAK_USER u WHERE U.USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into JUMAK_PAYMENT (PAYMENT_NUMBER, PAYMENT_DATE, PAYMENT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_TOTAL_DISCOUNT, PAYMENT_DELIVERY_FEE, PAYMENT_TOTAL, ORDER_NUMBER) values (SEQ_PAYMENT.nextval,SYSDATE,#{paymentTotalAmount},#{paymentTotalDiscount},#{paymentDeliveryFee},#{paymentTotal}, #{orderNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENT_NUMBER, PAYMENT_TOTAL, ORDER_DATE, USER_NUMBER, ORDER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT JP.PAYMENT_NUMBER, JP.PAYMENT_TOTAL, JO.ORDER_DATE, JO.USER_NUMBER, JO.ORDER_NUMBER FROM JUMAK_ORDER JO INNER JOIN JUMAK_PAYMENT JP ON JO.USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber} AND JO.ORDER_NUMBER = JP.ORDER_NUMBER ORDER BY JO.ORDER_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
